name: PKPushRegistryDelegate
desc: The methods that you use to handle incoming PushKit notifications and registration events.

items.name: pushRegistry
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the system updated the credentials for the specified type of push notification.

items.name: pushRegistry
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the system invalidated the push token for the specified type.

items.name: pushRegistry
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that a remote push has been received.
